headline.print_headline: Stars Coach Ruff Earns 600th NHL Win Over Sabres
headline.main: Stars Coach Ruff Earns 600th NHL Win Over Sabres

docs.snippet: Alex Chiasson broke a third-period tie with his first goal in 13 games, and Lindy Ruff earned his 600th NHL coaching victory with a 3-2 win over his former team, the Buffalo Sabres, on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Chiasson broke a third-period tie with his first goal in 13 games, and Lindy Ruff earned his 600th NHL coaching victory with a 3-2 win over his former team, the Buffalo Sabres, on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Masked Man James Scores 61 Against Bobcats
headline.main: Masked Man James Scores 61 Against Bobcats

docs.snippet: Miami's LeBron James, wearing a protective mask to shield his broken nose, plundered a career-high 61 points in the Heat's 124-107 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Miami's LeBron James, wearing a protective mask to shield his broken nose, plundered a career-high 61 points in the Heat's 124-107 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Nepal Says Litterbugs No Longer Welcome on Everest
headline.main: Nepal Says Litterbugs No Longer Welcome on Everest

docs.snippet: Litterbugs, beware: Nepal is making new rules to persuade trekkers to clean up after themselves on Mount Everest, in the hopes of clearing the tons of rubbish now clogging the world's highest peak....
docs.lead_paragraph: Litterbugs, beware: Nepal is making new rules to persuade trekkers to clean up after themselves on Mount Everest, in the hopes of clearing the tons of rubbish now clogging the world's highest peak.

headline.print_headline: Wild Douse Flames, Stretch Win Streak to 5
headline.main: Wild Douse Flames, Stretch Win Streak to 5

docs.snippet: Jared Spurgeon's power-play goal in the third period helped the Minnesota Wild notch their season-high fifth straight win, 3-2 over the Calgary Flames on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jared Spurgeon's power-play goal in the third period helped the Minnesota Wild notch their season-high fifth straight win, 3-2 over the Calgary Flames on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Texas Slips Past No. 18 Oklahoma State 65-58
headline.main: Texas Slips Past No. 18 Oklahoma State 65-58

docs.snippet: Imani McGee-Stafford scored 16 points and grabbed 12 rebounds to lead Texas to a 65-58 win over No. 18 Oklahoma State on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Imani McGee-Stafford scored 16 points and grabbed 12 rebounds to lead Texas to a 65-58 win over No. 18 Oklahoma State on Monday night.

docs.snippet: The Reserve Bank of Australia kept its cash rate unchanged at 2.5 percent on Tuesday, following its monthly policy meeting. The following is a chronology of the Reserve Bank of Australia's interest rate moves since 1990....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Reserve Bank of Australia kept its cash rate unchanged at 2.5 percent on Tuesday, following its monthly policy meeting. The following is a chronology of the Reserve Bank of Australia's interest rate moves since 1990.

headline.print_headline: Australia Central Bank Holds Rates at 2.5 Percent
headline.main: Australia Central Bank Holds Rates at 2.5 Percent

docs.snippet: Australia's central bank kept its cash rate steady at a record low of 2.5 percent on Tuesday, a widely expected decision given evidence past policy cuts were working to stimulate the economy as desired....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia's central bank kept its cash rate steady at a record low of 2.5 percent on Tuesday, a widely expected decision given evidence past policy cuts were working to stimulate the economy as desired.

headline.sub: Protesters clash with police in Venezuelan capital
headline.main: Protesters clash with police in Venezuelan capital

docs.snippet: Clashes break out in Caracas as jailed Venezuelan opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez urges supporters to continue anti-government protests. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clashes break out in Caracas as jailed Venezuelan opposition leader Leopoldo Lopez urges supporters to continue anti-government protests. Jillian Kitchener reports.
